com.st.st25sdk.type4a.st25ta

Class SysFileST25TA

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.type4a.FileType4
      • com.st.st25sdk.type4a.STSysFileType4
        • com.st.st25sdk.type4a.st25ta.SysFileST25TA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface, STType4CounterInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SysFileST25TAGpo

    public class SysFileST25TA
extends STSysFileType4
implements STType4CounterInterface
    Defines all required methods to handle counter feature in SYSTEM file for ST25TA series
